K10D0147_H0148:169b-0: stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan @169b dag

K10D0147_H0148:169b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa sgra bsgrags mchog gi rgyal po'i
K10D0147_H0148:169b-3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan gyis
K10D0147_H0148:169b-4: brgyan pa na byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad

K10D0147_H0148:169b-9: zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas skad cig

K10D0147_H0148:169b-14: phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor
K10D0147_H0148:169b-15: ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las
K10D0147_H0148:169b-16: byed cing rgyan thams cad bkod pa dang /
K10D0147_H0148:169b-17: rin po che'i dril bu g-yer kha'i dra bas bcom
K10D0147_H0148:169b-18: ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste tshigs su bcad
K10D0147_H0148:169b-19: pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par

K10D0147_H0148:169b-21: bla med rnams kyi gsung thugs spyod yul mtha' yas pa //

K10D0147_H0148:170a-0: dper na nam mkha'i mtha' ma skye bos mi rnyed @170a *//
K10D0147_H0148:170a-2: mtshungs med spyod pa mtha' dbus med pa ji bzhin du //

K10D0147_H0148:170a-6: de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang
K10D0147_H0148:170a-7: chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis
K10D0147_H0148:170a-8: bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas steng gi
K10D0147_H0148:170a-9: bar snang la dong ste rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi
K10D0147_H0148:170a-10: stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la
K10D0147_H0148:170a-11: 'khod do; ;de ltar phyogs bcu dag nas byang chub
K10D0147_H0148:170a-12: sems dpa' bcu 'dus pa la sogs pa byang chub
K10D0147_H0148:170a-13: sems dpa' tshad med pa dag 'od des bskul ma
K10D0147_H0148:170a-14: thag tu skad cig thang gcig yud tsam de la

K10D0147_H0148:170a-16: gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das

K10D0147_H0148:170a-19: mkhyen bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te
K10D0147_H0148:170a-20: gsung bsal ba'i sgra mdzad nas gsung bsal ba'i sgra

K10D0147_H0148:170a-22: khams dbyangs kyis go bar gyur te /
K10D0147_H0148:170a-23: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
K10D0147_H0148:170a-24: 'di na gang dag dad pa dang ldan zhing snod
K10D0147_H0148:170b-0: du gyur @170b pa'i dge slong dang /
K10D0147_H0148:170b-5: mi ma yin pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das
K10D0147_H0148:170b-6: kyis gsung bsal ba'i sgra de thos nas lus dang
K10D0147_H0148:170b-7: / sems tshim par gyur te sangs rgyas kyi mthus

K10D0147_H0148:170b-10: po che bkod par phyin te; de dag gis bcom
K10D0147_H0148:170b-11: ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas
K10D0147_H0148:170b-12: phyogs gcig tu ji ltar mthun pa'i stan dag la
K10D0147_H0148:170b-13: / 'khod do // gsung bsal ba'i sgra de nyid kyis tshangs pa'i lha rnams dang /
K10D0147_H0148:170b-28: 'du shes med pa'i sems can dang /
K10D0147_H0148:170b-33: 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang bskul nas skad cig
K10D0147_H0148:170b-34: thang gcig yud tsam de la 'khor gyi khyams rin
K10D0147_H0148:170b-35: po che bkod par phyin te /

K10D0147_H0148:170b-37: bos phyag btsal nas stan rab tu brtan pa dag
K10D0147_H0148:171a-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dus pa chen po de

K10D0147_H0148:171a-3: sems dpa'i stobs nye bar ston pa zhes bya ba'i

K10D0147_H0148:171a-6: tshogs la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas byang chub
K10D0147_H0148:171a-7: sems dpa'i tshogs de nyid kyi spyi bor mi snang
K10D0147_H0148:171a-8: bar gyur to // de nas byang chub sems dpa'
K10D0147_H0148:171a-9: me tog dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la
K10D0147_H0148:171a-10: dbang sgyur ba 'od nges reg ma thag tu de'i
K10D0147_H0148:171a-11: tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa'i ting
K10D0147_H0148:171a-12: nge 'dzin rgyan thams cad bkod pa zhes bya ba

K10D0147_H0148:171a-15: chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba byang chub sems
K10D0147_H0148:171a-16: dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyan thams cad bkod pa la
K10D0147_H0148:171a-17: snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe
K10D0147_H0148:171a-18: 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod pa'i dbus nas
K10D0147_H0148:171a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan sengge'i khri 'phang du shin
K10D0147_H0148:171a-20: ta la bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad
K10D0147_H0148:171a-22: rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa /
K10D0147_H0148:171a-23: kha khyer rgyan thams cad las byas pa /
K10D0147_H0148:171a-24: ras bkod pa thams cad bting ba /
K10D0147_H0148:171a-25: me tog sil ma sna tshogs thams cad bkram pa /
K10D0147_H0148:171b-0: bla re yid du 'ong @171b ba thams cad bres pa /

K10D0147_H0148:171b-2: 'khor thams cad kyi mig gis bltas pa /
K10D0147_H0148:171b-3: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa /
K10D0147_H0148:171b-4: bsam pa tshim par byed pa zhig byung bar gyur to //

K10D0147_H0148:171b-12: ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K10D0147_H0148:171b-13: nyi ma'i 'od kyis 'gro ba'i dgos pa rab tu bgyid //
K10D0147_H0148:171b-14: lha dbang gzi brjid yon tan sum cu rtsa gsum dga'//
K10D0147_H0148:171b-15: tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten rnam par mdzes //
K10D0147_H0148:171b-16: sangs rgyas mthu yi yul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa
K10D0147_H0148:171b-17: 'di; ;chos rnams mi g-yo nam mkha'i rang bzhin ya
K10D0147_H0148:171b-18: ma bral // sgyu ma smig rgyu lta bu chu yi zla 'dra zhing //
K10D0147_H0148:171b-19: rje med byed pa po dang tshor ba po med par //

K10D0147_H0148:171b-21: bkod pa'i sems kyi dbang 'gro sems ni gzugs can min /
K10D0147_H0148:171b-22: rnam sgrub thams cad sems kyi rang bzhin dbang du 'gro //
K10D0147_H0148:172a-2: rnam sgrub bdag gis ma mchis gang na'ang gnas ma mchis //
K10D0147_H0148:172a-3: gang gis sems rgyun ma mchis rang bzhin dag 'tshal ba //
K10D0147_H0148:172a-4: de la glo bur gnas pa'i nyon mongs ma mchis so //
K10D0147_H0148:172a-5: rtog dang kun rtog yongs su rtog las sems grol ba //
K10D0147_H0148:172a-6: de ni sgyu ma'i rnam bar sprul pa sna tshogs ston //
K10D0147_H0148:172a-7: sa steng rdul tsam mngon par 'phags pa ma mchis kyang //
K10D0147_H0148:172a-8: sa steng nor bu rin chen sna tshogs kun tu bstan //
K10D0147_H0148:172a-9: gdan gang bzhugs nas sems can bye ba 'dul 'gyur ba //
K10D0147_H0148:172a-10: khyod kyi sengge'i khri gdan rab mdzes bdag gis bgyis //
K10D0147_H0148:172a-11: gdus dang rgyal mtshan mchog dan dar gyi phreng ba bsgrengs //
K10D0147_H0148:172a-12: de ni gang du'ang 'gro ba ma mchis 'ong ma mchis //

K10D0147_H0148:172a-14: sems can dam pa rnam par 'phrul ba sna tshogs ston //

K10D0147_H0148:172b-5: sengge'i khri de la bzhugs so //

K10D0147_H0148:172b-8: pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa

K10D0147_H0148:172b-10: byang chub sems dpa'i lam bkod pa la dmigs pa
K10D0147_H0148:172b-11: dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo thams cad dang /
K10D0147_H0148:172b-13: mi 'jigs pa yongs su sgrub pa dang /
K10D0147_H0148:172b-14: ye shes kyi 'byung gnas chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i skor 'jug pa /
K10D0147_H0148:172b-15: so so yang dag par rig pa la rnam par
K10D0147_H0148:172b-16: gtan la dbab pa la gzhol ba'i sgor 'jug pa

K10D0147_H0148:172b-18: phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor la mi skye ba'i chos ston pa /

K10D0147_H0148:172b-20: chos kyi dbyings tshul gcig cing ma 'dres pa la 'jug pa /
K10D0147_H0148:172b-21: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang dbang po la 'jug pa ston pa /
K10D0147_H0148:172b-23: chos rnam par gdon mi za ba /

K10D0147_H0148:173a-24: sems rab tu dben par shes pa /
K10D0147_H0148:173a-25: theg pa chen pos 'dul ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen
K10D0147_H0148:173b-0: @173b pa'i ye shes kyi sang dbang bskur ba rab

K10D0147_H0148:173b-3: sgyur ba'i tshul la 'jug pa 'di lta bu'i chos

K10D0147_H0148:173b-13: bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad tshar gcad pa dang /
K10D0147_H0148:173b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'bar bar bya ba dang /
K10D0147_H0148:173b-15: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa chen po yongs su thob

K10D0147_H0148:173b-19: de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa'
K10D0147_H0148:173b-20: rin chen srog shing zhes bya bas sangs rgyas kyi
K10D0147_H0148:173b-21: rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

K10D0147_H0148:173b-24: so // de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub

K10D0147_H0148:174a-1: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thams cad

K10D0147_H0148:174a-3: tog gi lda ldi dag dang /

K10D0147_H0148:174a-8: blo mchog rgya mtshos dri bkod pa zhes bya ba'i

K10D0147_H0148:174a-18: snying rje chen po sems pas mig mi 'dzum pa

K10D0147_H0148:174b-0: blo mtha' @174b yas dri med kyis chos la mchog

K10D0147_H0148:174b-2: snyoms par zhugs nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor
K10D0147_H0148:174b-3: chos don du gnyer zhing chos la dga' ba dang
K10D0147_H0148:174b-4: / mos par byin gyis brlabs so //

K10D0147_H0148:174b-6: spobs pa'i rgyan bkod pas rab tu zhi ba dang
K10D0147_H0148:174b-7: ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
K10D0147_H0148:174b-8: par zhugs nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor sgrib
K10D0147_H0148:174b-9: pa lnga rnam par sel bar byin gyis brlabs so
K10D0147_H0148:174b-10: // de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems
K10D0147_H0148:174b-11: dpa' chos thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal pos
K10D0147_H0148:174b-12: brjed pa med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting
K10D0147_H0148:174b-13: nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thams cad dang
K10D0147_H0148:174b-14: ldan pa'i 'khor byang chub kyi sems dran zhing de
K10D0147_H0148:174b-15: bzhin gshegs pa la dmigs pa mi brjed par byin
K10D0147_H0148:174b-16: // gyis brlabs so // de nas de'i tshe sangs
K10D0147_H0148:174b-17: rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
K10D0147_H0148:174b-18: po kun nas snang ba zhes bya bas zil gyis
K10D0147_H0148:174b-19: mi non pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
K10D0147_H0148:174b-20: snyoms par zhugs nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor
K10D0147_H0148:174b-21: // gyis brlabs so // bdud dang / phyir rgol ba bcom par byin gyis brlabs so //
K10D0147_H0148:174b-22: de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub
K10D0147_H0148:174b-23: sems dpa' bdud rab tu 'joms pas bdud kyi dkyil
K10D0147_H0148:175a-1: par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K10D0147_H0148:175a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i bdud rab tu 'joms pa bdud
K10D0147_H0148:175a-3: kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'joms pa'i ting nge 'dzin
K10D0147_H0148:175a-4: de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas
K10D0147_H0148:175a-5: de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
K10D0147_H0148:175a-6: gyi khams na bdud bye ba phrag brgya ji snyed
K10D0147_H0148:175a-7: pa de dag thams cad dpung dang bcas /
K10D0147_H0148:175a-8: g-yog 'khor dang bcas te myur ba myur ba ring
K10D0147_H0148:175a-9: thabs su rang rang gi bdud kyi gnas nas mi
K10D0147_H0148:175a-10: snang bar gyur te 'khor gyi khyams rin po che
K10D0147_H0148:175a-11: bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas
K10D0147_H0148:175a-12: de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
K10D0147_H0148:175a-13: bos phyag btsal te lha'i mchod pa rnam pa brgya
K10D0147_H0148:175a-14: stong phrag du mas bcom ldan 'das la mchod nas
K10D0147_H0148:175a-15: gus pa dang bcas shing zhe sa dang bcas par
K10D0147_H0148:175a-16: thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba
K10D0147_H0148:175a-23: byang chub sems dpa' bdud rab tu 'joms pa'i byin
K10D0147_H0148:175a-24: gyi rlabs kyis bdag cag bdud kyi su ga las
K10D0147_H0148:175a-25: 'dor zhing slan chad sems can rnams la mig gis
K10D0147_H0148:175b-0: mi rtsol bar 'gyur ba'i @175b las mi bgyid do
K10D0147_H0148:175b-2: bdag cag la dbugs dbyung ba stsol cig dang /
K10D0147_H0148:175b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mchis te bdag cag chos nyan par bgyid do //
K10D0147_H0148:175b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud de dag dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10D0147_H0148:175b-7: gang gi phyir khyed bdud kyi las kyang 'or la
K10D0147_H0148:175b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa la chos bshad par gsol ba'ang
K10D0147_H0148:175b-9: thob cig dang / de nyid khyed kyi bdud kyi lam thams cad las 'da' ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
K10D0147_H0148:175b-11: sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
K10D0147_H0148:175b-15: mun pa mun nag lo du mar bsags pa ni; mar me gcig gis med par 'gyur ro //
K10D0147_H0148:175b-17: de bzhin du nyon mongs pa'i mun pa mun nag
K10D0147_H0148:175b-18: bskal pa brgyar bsags pa'ang ye shes kyi stobs bskyed
K10D0147_H0148:175b-19: pa gcig gis med par 'gyur ro //
K10D0147_H0148:175b-25: nor bu rin po che chen po gcig gis mun pa mun nag thams cad sel to //
K10D0147_H0148:176a-0: de bzhin du dge ba'i sems lhag mthong dang ldan pa gcig gis mi shes pa'i mun @176a *//
K10D0147_H0148:176a-1: pa mun nag thams cad sel to //
K10D0147_H0148:176a-3: de'i phyir khyed dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis rim gyis
K10D0147_H0148:176a-4: mi shes pa'i mun pa mun nag thams cad bsal
K10D0147_H0148:176a-5: nas chos kyi snang ba chen po thob par 'gyur
K10D0147_H0148:176a-6: ro // de nas byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi
K10D0147_H0148:176a-7: dbang phyug gi rgyal po zhes bya ba 'khor de
K10D0147_H0148:176a-8: nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bcom
K10D0147_H0148:176a-9: ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0147_H0148:176a-11: sangs rgyas kyi yul de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K10D0147_H0148:176a-12: kun tu bstan pa 'di ni; bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K10D0147_H0148:176a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
K10D0147_H0148:176a-15: la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa med
K10D0147_H0148:176a-16: pa'i sgo zhes bgyi ba 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i
K10D0147_H0148:176a-17: chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bzhed par the tshom
K10D0147_H0148:176a-18: ma mchis so // de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10D0147_H0148:176a-20: ae ma byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'dus pa 'di ni /
K10D0147_H0148:176a-24: byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa /
K10D0147_H0148:176a-25: mngon par shes pa'i ye shes chen pos rnam par rol pa /
K10D0147_H0148:176a-27: sems shin tu byang bar bgyis te dri ma mchis pa /
K10D0147_H0148:176b-0: rig pa dang rnam par grol bas snang bar @176b
K10D0147_H0148:176b-1: gyur pa; sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags
K10D0147_H0148:176b-2: pa / chos thams cad la dbang phyug gis dbang sgyur pa /
K10D0147_H0148:176b-3: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol
K10D0147_H0148:176b-4: tu son pa; thabs mkhas pa thams cad las nges
K10D0147_H0148:176b-5: par skyes pa / bdud kyi las dang /
K10D0147_H0148:176b-7: nyon mongs pa thams cad bsal ba /
K10D0147_H0148:176b-9: ngan pa'i tshogs can gyi tshogs thams cad rab tu 'dul ba /
K10D0147_H0148:176b-10: tshig thams cad rab tu dbye ba bstan pa shes pa la mkhas pa /
K10D0147_H0148:176b-11: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu son pa /
K10D0147_H0148:176b-18: ye shes rab tu thob pa /
K10D0147_H0148:176b-19: byin gyi rlabs thogs pa ma mchis shing spobs pa rgyun mi chad pa /
K10D0147_H0148:176b-20: sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang /
K10D0147_H0148:176b-21: mchog ma lags pa shes pa la mkhas pa /
K10D0147_H0148:176b-22: sems can thams cad kyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston pa /
K10D0147_H0148:176b-23: 'khrul pa ma mchis par kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa'i chos ston pa /
K10D0147_H0148:176b-24: sems can thams cad kyi sgra dang /
K10D0147_H0148:176b-25: skad la mkhas pa; mi'am ci dang /
K10D0147_H0148:177a-0: shin tu bshes gnyen bgyis pas sems can thams cad yongs su @177a *//
K10D0147_H0148:177a-1: mya ngan las 'das pa la 'god pa /
K10D0147_H0148:177a-3: snying rje chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa can /
K10D0147_H0148:177a-4: brtan zhing shin tu gnas la mi g-yo zhing ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid pa /
K10D0147_H0148:177a-5: chos kyi rgyal mtshan yang dag par sgreng bar bgyid pa /
K10D0147_H0148:177a-6: rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi shigs pa'i khor yug lta bu /
K10D0147_H0148:177a-7: smon pa ma mchis pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa /
K10D0147_H0148:177a-8: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo blta dka' zhing rtogs par dka' ba la zhugs pa /
K10D0147_H0148:177a-10: rtag pa'i mtha' gnyi ga dang /
K10D0147_H0148:177a-11: lta bar gyur pa thams cad dang /
K10D0147_H0148:177a-12: bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par bcad pa /
K10D0147_H0148:177a-13: tshogs can chen po'i tshogs kyi rgyal po yongs su 'gugs pa /
K10D0147_H0148:177a-14: ded dpon chen po bskal pa grangs med par chos
K10D0147_H0148:177a-15: dkon mchog gis bsod nams yang dag par bsgrubs pa
K10D0147_H0148:177a-16: / sman pa'i rgyal po chen po sems can thams
K10D0147_H0148:177a-17: cad kyi nyon mongs pa gzugs can ma lags pa'i
K10D0147_H0148:177a-19: sengge'i sgra chen po sgrog pa /
K10D0147_H0148:177a-21: spyi'u tshugs kyi rgyud thams cad dang /
K10D0147_H0148:177a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba la mi skrag pa /
K10D0147_H0148:177a-23: mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos lus legs par brgyan pa /
K10D0147_H0148:177a-24: gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin bgyid pa thams cad la sems dpa' ba /
K10D0147_H0148:177b-1: mnyan pa lta bur gyur pa /
K10D0147_H0148:177b-4: byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
K10D0147_H0148:177b-7: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa /
K10D0147_H0148:177b-8: shin tu yongs su sbyang ba bgyis pa /
K10D0147_H0148:177b-9: sems can thams cad rab tu sgrol ba la brtson pa /
K10D0147_H0148:177b-11: 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad po rnyed pa dang /
K10D0147_H0148:177b-21: mchog tu dga' ba'i chos la sems zhugs pa /
K10D0147_H0148:177b-22: chos dkon mchog gi 'od zer dang ldan pa /
K10D0147_H0148:177b-23: shes rab kyis ngoms nas ngoms par bgyid pa /
K10D0147_H0148:177b-24: padma lta bu 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad kyis mi gos pa /
K10D0147_H0148:177b-25: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa /
K10D0147_H0148:177b-29: tshangs pa'i 'od mog mog por bgyid pa /
K10D0147_H0148:177b-30: rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa /
K10D0147_H0148:177b-31: chos dkon mchog thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba /
K10D0147_H0148:177b-32: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi gcod pa /
K10D0147_H0148:177b-33: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang /
K10D0147_H0148:177b-35: sangs rgyas kyi chos dkon mchog thams cad kyi mdzod yang dag par 'dzin pa /
K10D0147_H0148:178a-0: bsngags pa mtha' yas pa dang yang @178a *//
K10D0147_H0148:178a-2: bsod nams tshad ma mchis pa bsags pa /
K10D0147_H0148:178a-3: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams
K10D0147_H0148:178a-4: cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la nye bar gyur pa
K10D0147_H0148:178a-5: / phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par bsngags pa mthar
K10D0147_H0148:178a-6: mi phyin pa 'di lta bu rnams kyi 'dus pa
K10D0147_H0148:178a-8: de la bdag 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das ni /
K10D0147_H0148:178a-9: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges
K10D0147_H0148:178a-10: par 'byung ba sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bgyi
K10D0147_H0148:178a-11: ba 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs
K10D0147_H0148:178a-12: bshad par bzhed pa snyam bgyid do //
K10D0147_H0148:178a-14: ji tsam du sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni /
K10D0147_H0148:178a-16: sems can thams cad tshim par 'gyur ba /
K10D0147_H0148:178a-17: ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par skyed pa /
K10D0147_H0148:178a-18: sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su sbyong ba /
K10D0147_H0148:178a-19: spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul gcig la 'jug pa /
K10D0147_H0148:178a-20: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos la dbang bskur ba /
K10D0147_H0148:178a-21: skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
K10D0147_H0148:178a-22: rnams kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu chud mi za ba
K10D0147_H0148:178b-0: / nges @178b pa'i sems can rnams la rkyen nye bar sgrub pa /
K10D0147_H0148:178b-1: ma nges pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po nye bar sgrub pa /
K10D0147_H0148:178b-2: log pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can rnams 'dzud pa /
K10D0147_H0148:178b-3: theg pa gsum la mos pa'i sems can rnams la rnam par dgod pa ston pa ste /
K10D0147_H0148:178b-9: lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rgyan lags so //
K10D0147_H0148:178b-10: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10D0147_H0148:178b-12: sangs rgyas byung bar gyur na /
K10D0147_H0148:178b-13: ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'di lta bu 'di dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0147_H0148:178b-15: skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gis 'khor gyi khyams
K10D0147_H0148:178b-16: 'dir sems bskyed pa gcig gis bkod pa gang byin
K10D0147_H0148:178b-19: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bskal pa brgya phrag stong du'ang ston pa'i rngo mi thogs so //
K10D0147_H0148:178b-21: de la bdag 'di snyam bgyid de /
K10D0147_H0148:178b-22: ae ma ji tsam du gang rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam
K10D0147_H0148:178b-23: par sprul pa'i cho 'phrul 'di lta bu 'di mthong
K10D0147_H0148:178b-24: yang nyan thos kyi theg pa'am /
K10D0147_H0148:178b-25: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la re ba skyed
K10D0147_H0148:178b-26: pa'i sems can shes rab 'chal pa can de dag
K10D0147_H0148:178b-27: ni / ngo mtshar che ba snyam bgyid do //
K10D0147_H0148:178b-28: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10D0147_H0148:179a-1: sems dang po bskyed pa nyid kyis nyan thos dang /
K10D0147_H0148:179a-2: rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis non pa'i slad du'o //
K10D0147_H0148:179a-5: shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can gyi mi la
K10D0147_H0148:179a-6: la zhig nor bu rin po che bee d'urya bor
K10D0147_H0148:179a-7: nas nor bu mching bu la dmigs pa snyam du
K10D0147_H0148:179a-9: gang dag theg pa chen po bor nas nyan thos dang /
K10D0147_H0148:179a-10: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dmigs par bgyi ba snyam du sems pa'i sems can dag ni /
K10D0147_H0148:179a-11: 'dra ba nyid du bdag la gda'o //
K10D0147_H0148:179a-14: rigs kyi bu mo gang dag lhag pa'i bsam pas
K10D0147_H0148:179a-15: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
K10D0147_H0148:179a-16: chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
K10D0147_H0148:179a-17: skyed par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ni /
K10D0147_H0148:179a-18: ring po mi thogs par chos 'di lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K10D0147_H0148:179a-19: byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal
K10D0147_H0148:179a-20: pos bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha dang mir
K10D0147_H0148:179a-21: bcas pa'i skye rgu'i 'khor de las srog chags bye
K10D0147_H0148:179a-22: ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gsum cus bla na
K10D0147_H0148:179a-23: med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
K10D0147_H0148:179a-24: sems bskyed do // rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba 'dus pa'i le'u'o ////
K10D0147_H0148:179b-0: de nas bcom ldan @179b 'das kyis byang chub sems
K10D0147_H0148:179b-1: dpa'i 'dus pa chen po de gzigs nas ae ma
K10D0147_H0148:179b-2: byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa 'di dag ni /
K10D0147_H0148:179b-3: chos don du gnyer ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos
K10D0147_H0148:179b-4: kyi mdzod 'dzin par mkhyen nas byang chub sems dpa'i
K10D0147_H0148:179b-5: spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba sgrib
K10D0147_H0148:179b-6: pa med pa'i sgo'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs rab
K10D0147_H0148:179b-7: tu bshad pa'i phyir mi 'jigs pas spobs pa zhes
K10D0147_H0148:179b-8: bya ba'i 'od zer skyes bu chen po'i mtshan spyi
K10D0147_H0148:179b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od zer de phyung ma thag
K10D0147_H0148:179b-11: tu de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub
K10D0147_H0148:179b-12: sems dpa'i tshogs la lan bdun bskor ba byas te
K10D0147_H0148:179b-13: byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal
K10D0147_H0148:179b-14: po'i lus la lan brgyar bskor ba byas nas byang
K10D0147_H0148:179b-15: chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po'i
K10D0147_H0148:179b-16: spyi gtsug tu mi snang bar gyur to //
K10D0147_H0148:179b-17: 'od des byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug
K10D0147_H0148:179b-18: gi rgyal po la reg ma thag tu de nas
K10D0147_H0148:179b-19: sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi
K10D0147_H0148:179b-20: dbang phyug gi rgyal pos thams cad dang ldan pa'i
K10D0147_H0148:179b-21: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi 'od dang /
K10D0147_H0148:179b-23: lus brgya 'gyur du zil gyis mnan nas lam me /
K10D0147_H0148:180a-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' @180a *//
K10D0147_H0148:180a-1: gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos de bzhin gshegs
K10D0147_H0148:180a-2: pa'i byin gyi rlabs rig nas stan las langs te
K10D0147_H0148:180a-3: bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo
K10D0147_H0148:180a-4: g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan
K10D0147_H0148:180a-5: 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba
K10D0147_H0148:180a-6: btud nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang
K10D0147_H0148:180a-7: thad kyi steng gi bar snang la rin po che'i
K10D0147_H0148:180a-8: gdugs de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yu
K10D0147_H0148:180a-12: rin po che ne tso'am ci /
K10D0147_H0148:180a-15: mu tig gi do shal rab tu dpyangs pa /
K10D0147_H0148:180a-16: dar gyi lda ldis mdzes par byas pa /
K10D0147_H0148:180a-17: dril bu g-yer ka'i dra ba 'khrol ba /

K10D0147_H0148:311a-15: dran med yid la byed med de ni shes rab las //
K10D0147_H0148:311a-16: sdig pa spangs te dge ba spyod pa shes rab rtsa //
K10D0147_H0148:311a-17: chos 'di rang bzhin spangs pa de ni shes rab las //
K10D0147_H0148:311a-18: gal te rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi sgom shes rab rtsa //
K10D0147_H0148:311a-19: lhun grub rdzu 'phrul thob pa 'di ni shes rab las //
K10D0147_H0148:311a-20: dad pas mos nas yid ches pa ni shes rab rtsa //
K10D0147_H0148:311a-21: chags pa thams cad gang bral de ni shes rab las //
K10D0147_H0148:311a-22: zhum med rtag tu brtson pa de ni shes rab rtsa //
K10D0147_H0148:311a-23: lus dang yid sems rab sbyangs de ni shes rab las //
K10D0147_H0148:311b-0: dran dang shes @311b bzhin mkhas pa 'di ni shes rab rtsa //
K10D0147_H0148:311b-1: gnas rnams kun la mi gnas 'di ni shes rab las //
K10D0147_H0148:311b-2: rang gis ting 'dzin rtogs pa de ni shes rab rtsa //
K10D0147_H0148:311b-3: rang bzhin mnyam par bzhag la spyod 'di shes rab las //
K10D0147_H0148:311b-4: gal te shes rab dbang por rab gnas shes rab rtsa //
K10D0147_H0148:311b-5: 'gro ba'i dbang po thams cad thos pa shes rab las //
K10D0147_H0148:311b-6: stobs lnga po dag rjes su sgom pa shes rab rtsa //
K10D0147_H0148:311b-7: bcom nas ye shes thob pa de ni shes rab las //
K10D0147_H0148:311b-8: byang chub yan lag rjes mthun bzod pa shes rab rtsa //
K10D0147_H0148:311b-9: chos kun rjes su gang rtogs de ni shes rab las //
K10D0147_H0148:311b-10: lam gyi yan lag skye gnas sgrub pa shes rab rtsa //
K10D0147_H0148:311b-11: chos dang chos min spon ba 'di ni shes rab las //
K10D0147_H0148:311b-12: sdug bsngal rang bzhin mkhas pa 'di ni shes rab rtsa //
K10D0147_H0148:311b-13: gal te 'gog pa mngon sum byed 'di shes rab las /
K10D0147_H0148:311b-14: drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde tshig 'dzin shes rab rtsa //
K10D0147_H0148:311b-15: nges pa'i don la rton pa 'di ni shes rab las //
K10D0147_H0148:311b-16: thams cad thos pas mi ngoms 'di ni shes rab rtsa //
K10D0147_H0148:311b-17: don la rab tu rton pa 'di ni shes rab las //
K10D0147_H0148:311b-18: rnam par shes la tshul bzhin tshol pa shes rab rtsa //
K10D0147_H0148:311b-19: ye shes la ni rab tu rton 'di shes rab las //
K10D0147_H0148:311b-20: gang zag gang la'ang ma zhen 'di ni shes rab rtsa //
K10D0147_H0148:311b-21: gal te chos nyid rton pa 'di ni shes rab las //
K10D0147_H0148:311b-22: 'du byed mi rtag yongs su tshol ba shes rab rtsa //
K10D0147_H0148:311b-23: gal te gzod nas ma skyes shes pa shes rab las //
K10D0147_H0148:312a-2: chos rnams 'dus ma byas su mos pa shes rab las //
K10D0147_H0148:312a-3: chos rnams bdag med the tshom med pa shes rab rtsa //
K10D0147_H0148:312a-4: sems can 'di dag gdod nas dag de shes rab las //
K10D0147_H0148:312a-5: mya ngan 'das la zhi bar mos pa shes rab rtsa //
K10D0147_H0148:312a-6: 'gro ba shin tu mya ngan 'das 'di shes rab las //
K10D0147_H0148:312a-7: don gyi rjes su rtogs pa 'di ni shes rab rtsa //
K10D0147_H0148:312a-8: don rtogs so so yang dag rig pa shes rab las //
K10D0147_H0148:312a-9: gal te chos nyid mos par byed pa shes rab rtsa //
K10D0147_H0148:312a-10: chos la so so yang dag rig pa shes rab las //
K10D0147_H0148:312a-11: sgra rnams kun la skrag pa med 'di shes rab rtsa //
K10D0147_H0148:312a-12: nges tshig so so yang dag rig 'di shes rab las //
K10D0147_H0148:312a-13: skrag med blo yis spobs pa de ni shes rab rtsa //
K10D0147_H0148:312a-14: spobs pa so so yang dag rig pa shes rab las //
K10D0147_H0148:312a-15: gal te sems can gnas pa'i byams de shes rab rtsa //
K10D0147_H0148:312a-16: dmigs pa med pa'i byams thob de ni shes rab las //
K10D0147_H0148:312a-17: bdag dang gzhan la snying rje 'di ni shes rab rtsa //
K10D0147_H0148:312a-18: gang gis gnyi gar mi rtog de ni shes rab las //
K10D0147_H0148:312a-19: mchog tu dga' la dga' ba thob 'di shes rab rtsa //
K10D0147_H0148:312a-20: dga' med gdung ba med pa 'di ni shes rab las //
K10D0147_H0148:312a-21: byams dang gnod par mi byed de ni shes rab rtsa //
K10D0147_H0148:312a-22: gnyis las sems grol thob pa de ni shes rab las //
K10D0147_H0148:312a-23: blo gros ldan pa sangs rgyas dran 'di shes rab rtsa //
K10D0147_H0148:312b-0: gang tshe chos sku rjes su rtogs pa shes @312b rab las //
K10D0147_H0148:312b-1: chos kyang rtag tu dran pa 'di ni shes rab rtsa //
K10D0147_H0148:312b-2: chos rnams 'dod chags bral bar rtogs pa shes rab las //
K10D0147_H0148:312b-3: yon tan las ni dge 'dun dran de shes rab rtsa //
K10D0147_H0148:312b-4: de yang 'dus ma byas su rtogs pa shes rab las //
K10D0147_H0148:312b-5: blo ldan gtong ba dran pa de ni shes rab rtsa //
K10D0147_H0148:312b-6: gang phyir nyon mongs kun 'dor 'di ni shes rab las //
K10D0147_H0148:312b-7: tshul khrims shin tu dag pa dran 'di shes rab
K10D0147_H0148:312b-8: rtsa; ;tshul khrims zag pa med la gnas ni shes
K10D0147_H0148:312b-9: rab las // che ba'i bdag nyid lha dran 'di ni shes rab rtsa //
K10D0147_H0148:312b-10: dge nas dag pa dran pa 'di ni shes rab las //
K10D0147_H0148:312b-11: gang phyir bsgrims te thos pa tshol ba shes rab rtsa //
K10D0147_H0148:312b-12: gzhan dag las ni phyis mi tshol ba shes rab las //
K10D0147_H0148:312b-13: legs par byed pa'i las byed 'di ni shes rab rtsa //
K10D0147_H0148:312b-14: las phyis mngon par 'du mi byed pa shes rab las //
K10D0147_H0148:312b-15: nga rgyal med cing 'dud par byed pa shes rab rtsa //
K10D0147_H0148:312b-16: ye shes che ba'i bdag nyid thob 'di shes rab las //
K10D0147_H0148:312b-17: bdag gi don la brtson 'gyur 'di ni shes rab rtsa //
K10D0147_H0148:312b-18: sems can rnams kyi don byed 'di ni shes rab las //
K10D0147_H0148:312b-19: gal te chos kyi phung po 'dzin byed shes rab rtsa //
K10D0147_H0148:312b-20: sems can spyod pa rjes su rtogs byed shes rab las //
K10D0147_H0148:312b-21: gzhan gyi blo la yang dag thob byed shes rab rtsa //
K10D0147_H0148:312b-22: sems can theg gsum nges 'byung byed pa shes rab las //
K10D0147_H0148:312b-23: blo gros ldan pa sbyin dang snyan par smra ba dang /
K10D0147_H0148:313a-0: don byed sems can yongs su smin byed @313a *//
K10D0147_H0148:313a-2: gal te don mthun pa yis sangs rgyas yon tan 'god //
K10D0147_H0148:313a-3: 'di ni skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi shes rab las //
K10D0147_H0148:313a-4: srid pa kun tu 'bar zhes skrag pa shes rab rtsa //
K10D0147_H0148:313a-5: mi skye bzod pa thob pa de ni shes rab las //
K10D0147_H0148:313a-6: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'di shes rab rtsa ba ste //
K10D0147_H0148:313a-7: dbang bskur de yis thob de ni shes rab las //
K10D0147_H0148:313a-8: gal te byang chub shing drung 'dug pa shes rab rtsa //
K10D0147_H0148:313a-9: kun mkhyen ye shes rig pa 'di ni shes rab las //
K10D0147_H0148:313a-10: byang chub sems 'di shes rab rtsa ba zhes kyang bya //
K10D0147_H0148:313a-11: sems ni gnas su gang byed de ni shes rab las /
K10D0147_H0148:313a-12: gang dag byang chub sems la rtag gnas mi g-yo ba //
K10D0147_H0148:313a-13: de dag shes rab kyis ni rtag tu las bya byed //
K10D0147_H0148:313a-14: rtsa ba 'di 'dra byang chub spyod pa mchog gi sems //
K10D0147_H0148:313a-15: sangs rgyas stobs dang de bzhin so so yang dag rig /
K10D0147_H0148:313a-16: de yi bsngags pa bskal pa bye ba mang brjod kyang //
K10D0147_H0148:313a-17: sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' mar thug par 'gyur ba med //
K10D0147_H0148:313a-18: gang dag 'das pa'i bde gshegs de bzhin da ltar byung //
K10D0147_H0148:313a-19: gang dag ma 'ongs pa dang phyogs bcu'i thub dbang po //
K10D0147_H0148:313a-20: tshad med pa la bsnyen bkur tshad med byed 'dod gang //
K10D0147_H0148:313a-21: de ni ma myos byang chub sems la dga' ba yin //
K10D0147_H0148:313a-22: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'
K10D0147_H0148:313a-23: gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos 'di skad ces
K10D0147_H0148:313b-0: @313b kye ma ji tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan
K10D0147_H0148:313b-1: 'das rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par
K10D0147_H0148:313b-2: rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di shin tu rnam par nges
K10D0147_H0148:313b-3: shing yi ge rnams kyis bstan pa mtha' yas pa
K10D0147_H0148:313b-4: / don gyis 'jug pa mtha' yas pa /
K10D0147_H0148:313b-5: mi brtson pa rnams kyis 'jug par dka' ba /
K10D0147_H0148:313b-6: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rjes su rtogs pas zab pa /
K10D0147_H0148:313b-7: gnyis la spyod pa rnams kyis 'tshal bar dka' ba;
K10D0147_H0148:313b-8: skye mched drug la brten pa rnams kyis mthong bar
K10D0147_H0148:313b-9: dka' ba / theg pa dman pa la mos pa rnams kyis yid ches par dka' ba /
K10D0147_H0148:313b-10: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ma lags pa; byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod yul /
K10D0147_H0148:313b-11: chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya /
K10D0147_H0148:313b-12: chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid pas phye ba ma mchis pa /
K10D0147_H0148:313b-13: nam mkha'i mtshan nyid kyi slad du 'gyur ba ma mchis pa /
K10D0147_H0148:313b-14: shin tu 'das pas kun gzhi ma mchis pa /
K10D0147_H0148:313b-15: sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rab tu shes pa /
K10D0147_H0148:313b-16: rgyu thams cad yongs su shes pa /
K10D0147_H0148:313b-17: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba; nges par 'byung ba rnams kyi 'byung ba /
K10D0147_H0148:313b-18: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi thabs /
K10D0147_H0148:313b-19: so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa rnams kyis rnam par dbye bar bgyi ba /
K10D0147_H0148:313b-20: mngon par shes pa thob pa rnams kyis rnam par dgrol bar bgyi ba /
K10D0147_H0148:313b-21: tshul gcig la gnas pa rnams kyis mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par bgyi ba /
K10D0147_H0148:314a-0: sna tshogs ma mchis par spyod pa rnams la khyad par ma @314a *//
K10D0147_H0148:314a-2: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid pas mnyam pa /
K10D0147_H0148:314a-3: gnyen po ma mchis pas mnyam pa ma mchis pa /
K10D0147_H0148:314a-4: sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid pas mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa /
K10D0147_H0148:314a-5: 'gog pas rab tu phye bas gnyis dang bral ba /
K10D0147_H0148:314a-6: yi ge rnams kyis dpyad du ma mchis pa /
K10D0147_H0148:314a-7: don gyi yang dag par bzhag pa /
K10D0147_H0148:314a-8: sgras rnam par rig par bgyi ba /
K10D0147_H0148:314a-9: don dam par brjod du ma mchis pa /
K10D0147_H0148:314a-11: dkon mchog gsum gyi mthu dang ldan pa /
K10D0147_H0148:314a-12: theg pa gsum la rnam par rtog pa /

K10D0147_H0148:314a-14: khams gsum pa las shin tu 'das pa /
K10D0147_H0148:314a-15: rig pa gsum po dag khong du chud par bgyid pa /
K10D0147_H0148:314a-16: rdo rje lta bur ting nge 'dzin bskyed pa /
K10D0147_H0148:314a-17: chos thams cad kyi gnas; sangs rgyas kyi ye shes las byung ba /
K10D0147_H0148:314a-18: sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsal bar mdzad pa ni /
K10D0147_H0148:314a-22: rigs kyi bu mo gang dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan
K10D0147_H0148:314a-23: 'das rnams kyi byang chub bstan pa tshad ma mchis
K10D0147_H0148:314a-24: pa 'di la mos par bgyid pa dang /
K10D0147_H0148:314a-25: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang sems skyed par bgyid pa dang /
K10D0147_H0148:314a-26: dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du mdo
K10D0147_H0148:314a-27: sde 'di lta bu 'di mnyan par bgyid pa dang
K10D0147_H0148:314b-3: kun chub par bgyid pa dang /
K10D0147_H0148:314b-4: gzhan dag la'ang rgyas par yang dag par ston par bgyid pa de dag ni /
K10D0147_H0148:314b-6: bsod nams mang du skyed pa lags so //
K10D0147_H0148:314b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la'ang byas pa gzo ba dang /
K10D0147_H0148:314b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0147_H0148:314b-12: ji skad smras pa bzhin te /
K10D0147_H0148:314b-13: de dag bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur ro //
K10D0147_H0148:314b-15: gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyis gzigs pa'i
K10D0147_H0148:314b-16: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rin po che thams
K10D0147_H0148:314b-17: cad kyis rab tu bkang ste de bzhin gshegs pa
K10D0147_H0148:314b-18: rnams la sbyin pa byin pa bas gang gis dam
K10D0147_H0148:314b-19: pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba dang /
K10D0147_H0148:314b-20: dkon mchog gsum rgyun mi chad par bya ba'i phyir mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di nyan tam /
K10D0147_H0148:314b-27: gzhan dag la'ang rgyas par yang dag par ston tam; sgom pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson par gnas na /
K10D0147_H0148:314b-29: de bas bsod nams ches mang du skyed do //
K10D0147_H0148:314b-30: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su
K10D0147_H0148:314b-31: bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to; ;sangs rgyas spyan
K10D0147_H0148:314b-32: gyis zhing gang ngas mthong ba //
K10D0147_H0148:314b-33: rin chen bkang ste de bzhin gshegs phyin yang //
K10D0147_H0148:314b-34: 'di lta bu yi chos 'di ma thos na //
K10D0147_H0148:314b-35: de ni bsod nams chung zhes nga smra'o //
K10D0147_H0148:315a-1: dam pa'i don ldan phra zad pa //
K10D0147_H0148:315a-2: mdo sde bzang bo 'di ni thos gyur na //
K10D0147_H0148:315a-3: kun tu 'dzin cing bzung nas klog byed pa //
K10D0147_H0148:315a-4: 'di ni de bas bsod nams mchog tu 'phags //
K10D0147_H0148:315a-5: 'di ltar rgyal ba'i chos kyis nyer gnas shing //
K10D0147_H0148:315a-6: chos kyis nges par 'byung gi zang zing min //
K10D0147_H0148:315a-7: de pas gang zhig bde gshegs chos 'dzin pa //
K10D0147_H0148:315a-8: de ni sangs rgyas kun la byas pa gzo //
K10D0147_H0148:315a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0147_H0148:315a-11: khyed kyi nang nas nga yongs su mya ngan las
K10D0147_H0148:315a-12: 'das pa'i phyin dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas
K10D0147_H0148:315a-13: par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyas
K10D0147_H0148:315a-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub 'di yongs su srung bar su spro //
K10D0147_H0148:315a-16: de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de'i nang nas
K10D0147_H0148:315a-17: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cus mgrin
K10D0147_H0148:315a-20: bdag cag rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub bskal
K10D0147_H0148:315a-21: pa grangs ma mchis par bsgrubs pa 'di 'dzin pa
K10D0147_H0148:315a-22: dang / slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus de na'ang rgyas par bgyid par spro'o //
K10D0147_H0148:315a-24: 'on gyis kyang ci nas de'i dus na skye bo mang po gnas par 'gyur ba /
K10D0147_H0148:315a-25: dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can de dag
K10D0147_H0148:315a-26: gi rna bar grags par 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs
K10D0147_H0148:315b-0: pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin @315b gyis brlab
K10D0147_H0148:315b-1: tu gsol / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i
K10D0147_H0148:315b-2: tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to
K10D0147_H0148:315b-3: tu gsol / // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bden pa gsung //
K10D0147_H0148:315b-4: bden pa'i chos la rab tu gnas //
K10D0147_H0148:315b-5: byin gyi rlabs kyis de dag la //
K10D0147_H0148:315b-6: mdo sde 'di ni byin gyis brlabs //
K10D0147_H0148:315b-7: snying rje chen po'i go cha bgos //
K10D0147_H0148:315b-8: byams pa chen po rab tu gnas //
K10D0147_H0148:315b-9: kun la byams pa nyid kyi phyir //
K10D0147_H0148:315b-10: mdo sde 'di ni byin gyis brlabs bsod nams tshogs ni phun sum tshogs //
K10D0147_H0148:315b-11: ye shes tshogs kyis byung gyur pa //
K10D0147_H0148:315b-12: tshogs rnams kun dang ldan pa yis //
K10D0147_H0148:315b-13: mdo sde 'di ni byin gyis brlabs //
K10D0147_H0148:315b-14: bdud rnams thams cad nges 'joms la; ;smra ba thams cad rab 'dul zhing //
K10D0147_H0148:315b-15: lta ba thams cad rgyun gcod pa //
K10D0147_H0148:315b-16: mdo sde 'di ni byin gyis brlabs //
K10D0147_H0148:315b-17: 'jig rten skyong dang brgya byin dang //
K10D0147_H0148:315b-18: de bzhin lha ma yin rnams dang //
K10D0147_H0148:315b-19: lha dang dri za klu dag kyang //
K10D0147_H0148:315b-20: ngas ni byin gyis brlabs pa byas //
K10D0147_H0148:315b-21: sa dang de bzhin bar snang la //
K10D0147_H0148:315b-22: lha rnams mang po gang 'khod pa //
K10D0147_H0148:315b-23: sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin rlabs kyis //
K10D0147_H0148:315b-24: tshul 'di rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur; ;'khor 'di bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir //
K10D0147_H0148:315b-25: tshangs pa'i gnas pa rnams ldan zhing //
K10D0147_H0148:315b-26: bden pa bzhi yis brgyan gyur pa //
K10D0147_H0148:315b-27: mdo sde 'di ni byin gyis brlabs //
K10D0147_H0148:315b-28: nam mkha' gzugs can byed kyang srid //
K10D0147_H0148:315b-29: gzugs ni gzugs med byed srid kyi //
K10D0147_H0148:315b-30: sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin rlabs ni //
K10D0147_H0148:315b-31: rnam par dkrug par mi nus so //
K10D0147_H0148:316a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag @316a *//
K10D0147_H0148:316a-1: gis mgrin gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to //
K10D0147_H0148:316a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag rnams //
K10D0147_H0148:316a-3: mdo 'di kun tu bsrung slad du //
K10D0147_H0148:316a-4: rtsa lag dang ni bcas rnams kyis //
K10D0147_H0148:316a-5: srung ba bzang po bgyi bar 'tshal //
K10D0147_H0148:316a-6: mkhas pa byang chub blo gros kyis //
K10D0147_H0148:316a-7: gang dag 'dzin par bgyid pa dang /
K10D0147_H0148:316a-8: de dag la ni phyogs bzhi nas //
K10D0147_H0148:316a-9: rtag par kun tu srung ba bgyi //

K10D0147_H0148:316a-11: byin gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to
K10D0147_H0148:316a-12: // bdag ni bcom ldan mdzad pa gzo //
K10D0147_H0148:316a-13: 'dren pa chos kyi dbang bdag lags //
K10D0147_H0148:316a-14: mgon po mdo sde mchog 'di las //
K10D0147_H0148:316a-15: sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab tu bstan //

K10D0147_H0148:316a-17: mdzad pa gzo ba srung bgyid cing //
K10D0147_H0148:316a-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das la mi mjed kyi bdag
K10D0147_H0148:316a-21: po tshangs pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol
K10D0147_H0148:316a-22: to // bsam gtan gang dang tshad med dang //
K10D0147_H0148:316a-23: theg pa kun gyis 'byung ba gang //
K10D0147_H0148:316a-24: de dag don ldan zab mo yi //
K10D0147_H0148:316a-26: bdag ni tshangs pa'i bde bor te //
K10D0147_H0148:316a-28: mnyan pa'i slad dang de bzhin du //
K10D0147_H0148:316a-29: bsrung ba'i slad du mchi bar bgyi //
K10D0147_H0148:316a-30: de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu rab dga'
K10D0147_H0148:316b-0: ldan gyis tshigs su @316b bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol
K10D0147_H0148:316b-1: to // gang zhig sangs rgyas gsung ba yi //
K10D0147_H0148:316b-3: skye ba gcig gis rab gnas nas /
K10D0147_H0148:316b-4: dga' ldan rnams su gnas par 'gyur //
K10D0147_H0148:316b-5: mgon po bdag ni lha yul ba'i //
K10D0147_H0148:316b-6: phun sum tshogs pa por nas su //
K10D0147_H0148:316b-7: tshul 'di rab tu ston bgyid cing //
K10D0147_H0148:316b-8: dzambu gling du gnas par spro //

K10D0147_H0148:316b-10: dpon gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to
K10D0147_H0148:316b-11: // gang zhig don dang ldan pa yi //

K10D0147_H0148:316b-15: mdo 'di kun tu bsrung slad du //
K10D0147_H0148:316b-16: ci nas kyang ni rgyas 'gyur par //

K10D0147_H0148:316b-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das la bdud sdig can gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to //
K10D0147_H0148:316b-19: rnam par 'dren pa gang zhig ni //
K10D0147_H0148:316b-20: nyon mongs thams cad tshar gcod pa //

K10D0147_H0148:316b-23: mdo sde mchog ni 'byung ba der //
K10D0147_H0148:316b-24: bdud kyi go skabs ma mchis so //
K10D0147_H0148:316b-25: mgon pos gsungs pa dran bgyid pa //

K10D0147_H0148:317a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'
K10D0147_H0148:317a-8: byams pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to
K10D0147_H0148:317a-9: // mi gang byang chub rab zhugs te //

K10D0147_H0148:317a-18: 'od srung chen pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis
K10D0147_H0148:317a-19: gsol to // ston pa las ni bdag gis su //

K10D0147_H0148:317a-21: bdag gis mdo sde 'di lta bu //
K10D0147_H0148:317a-22: sngon chad nam yang ma thos so //
K10D0147_H0148:317a-23: mngon sum du ni mdo sde 'di //

K10D0147_H0148:317a-30: byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
K10D0147_H0148:317a-31: nyan thos chen po de dag la legs so //
K10D0147_H0148:317b-2: khyed kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir
K10D0147_H0148:317b-3: 'di lta bu'i sengge'i sgra bsgrags pa legs so legs
K10D0147_H0148:317b-4: so // skyes bu dam pa dag /
K10D0147_H0148:317b-6: khyed kyis khong du chud par bya'o //
K10D0147_H0148:317b-7: sems can gang dag theg pa chen po la zhugs
K10D0147_H0148:317b-8: pa bzod pa ma thob pa de dag sangs rgyas
K10D0147_H0148:317b-9: bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis chos
K10D0147_H0148:317b-10: kyi rnam grangs 'di kun tu bzung ste /
K10D0147_H0148:317b-11: bzung nas kyang kun chub par byas nas bla na
K10D0147_H0148:317b-12: med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
K10D0147_H0148:317b-13: lung bstan pa ma thob kyi bar du de bzhin
K10D0147_H0148:317b-14: gshegs pa bdun pa las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro
K10D0147_H0148:317b-15: // gang dag nyan thos kyi theg pa par 'gyur ba de dag ni /
K10D0147_H0148:317b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i nyan thos 'dus pa dang po'i grangs su chud par 'gyur ro //

K10D0147_H0148:317b-18: kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ba de dag
K10D0147_H0148:317b-19: ni / nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i
K10D0147_H0148:317b-20: 'og tu gzhan las ma thos par rang byang chub
K10D0147_H0148:317b-22: gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos yongs su zhus

K10D0147_H0148:317b-25: pa dag byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K10D0147_H0148:317b-26: byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dag ni /
K10D0147_H0148:318a-0: @318a *// phyir mi ldog pa la rab tu gnas so //
K10D0147_H0148:318a-1: 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dag ni /
K10D0147_H0148:318a-2: rnam pa drug tu g-yos so //
K10D0147_H0148:318a-3: snang ba chen pos kyang gsal bar gyur to //
K10D0147_H0148:318a-4: me tog sil mas kyang gtor bar gyur to //
K10D0147_H0148:318a-5: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang
K10D0147_H0148:318a-6: chub sems dpa' de dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang
K10D0147_H0148:318a-7: / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa'i las
K10D0147_H0148:318a-8: kyi phyir thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi khyams
K10D0147_H0148:318a-9: rin po che bkod pa rin po che sna bdun
K10D0147_H0148:318a-10: gyi me tog gis rnam par bkra bar byas te
K10D0147_H0148:318a-11: ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do //
K10D0147_H0148:318a-13: bdag cag gis rnyed par bgyi ba legs par rnyed do //
K10D0147_H0148:318a-14: gang gi slad du bdag cag gis rnam par nges
K10D0147_H0148:318a-15: pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu thos pas
K10D0147_H0148:318a-16: bdag cag 'dir mchis pa don ma mchis pa ma
K10D0147_H0148:318a-17: lags so // kye ma bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i sku tshe yongs su bskyang du gsol //
K10D0147_H0148:318a-18: dzambu'i gling gi mi rnams la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par gyur cig /

K10D0147_H0148:318a-23: 'dzin pa de dag kyang dus ring por yun du
K10D0147_H0148:318a-24: tshe yongs su skyong bar gyur cig /
K10D0147_H0148:318b-0: sems can thams cad la'ang @318b phan pa byed par gyur cig /
K10D0147_H0148:318b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'
K10D0147_H0148:318b-2: gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos 'di skad ces
K10D0147_H0148:318b-3: gsol to // kye ma bcom ldan 'das ji tsam
K10D0147_H0148:318b-4: du rnam par nges pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
K10D0147_H0148:318b-8: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mchog tu dga' ba skyed pa dang /
K10D0147_H0148:318b-9: bdud dang pha rol rgol ba thams cad 'joms pa dang /

K10D0147_H0148:318b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan la 'jug pa'i rjes su song ba dang /
K10D0147_H0148:318b-14: thams cad kyis brtson par bgyi ba las gti mug ma mchis par ston par ngo mtshar to //
K10D0147_H0148:318b-16: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
K10D0147_H0148:318b-18: de skad ces gsol ba dang /
K10D0147_H0148:318b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi
K10D0147_H0148:318b-20: dbang phyug gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka'
K10D0147_H0148:318b-21: stsal to // de'i phyir gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po /

K10D0147_H0148:318b-23: pa'i snying rje chen po bstan pa zhes bya bar
